overview: Residential training to help disabled adults find work - what you'll get, eligibility and how to claim
title: Residential training for disabled adults

table.body:
If you're an unemployed disabled adult you can apply for residential training. You can do this if there aren't any suitable training courses available to you locally. 

The courses can help you get a job, give you more experience to keep a job or become self-employed. 

The training courses take place in accessible college buildings. Staff with knowledge of disability issues teach the courses.

There are 9 [residential training providers](http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Dl1/Directories/UsefulContactsByCategory/DisabledPeopleContacts/OrganisationsAndCharities/DG_10016715 "Residential training providers"){:rel="external"} located throughout England but there are no providers in Wales or Scotland.
table.title: Overview

table.body:
You'll get help finding work through a combination of guidance, work experience and qualifications. Courses vary from college to college, with many leading to National Vocational Qualifications (NVQs) in things like:

- administration
- catering
- retail
- horticulture
- leisure/tourism/travel

You can also get help with your living costs and some travel costs. The amount you get will depend; for example, on the cost of your accommodation or price of travel tickets.

*[NVQs]: National Vocational Qualifications
table.title: What you'll get

table.body:
You can apply for residential training if you can't find training courses locally and you're:

- a UK resident with a disability
- aged 18 or over
- unemployed
table.title: Eligibility

table.body:
You can apply for residential training and find out what courses are available by contacting your [Disability Employment Adviser](/looking-for-work-if-youre-disabled "Disability Employment Adviser") at your local [Jobcentre.](http://los.direct.gov.uk/default.aspx?type=1&lang=en "Jobcentre"){:rel="external"}

They can also give you information about the help with costs you get while training.
table.title: How to claim
